price: 100. Waxay ku leeyihiin gudaheeda cartan iyo hiinraag, oo waxna gudaheeda kuma maqlaan.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
